name: Noah Fixed
description:
This is the fixed version of my 2023 Brackey’s Jam game: you can find the actual submission here.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

You control your left hand with Q/leftClick and your right hand with E/rightClick

Q/E ---- pick up/craft items leftClick/rightClick ---- use/drop items

A/D ---- steer the ark W/S ---- control speed of the ark

How to play: Small animals can be caught with a net. Larger ones require a bolas and the biggest ones even two. After catching an animal go to it and one of your sons will bring it to the ark. After sending all three you need to get back.

Combine different items you find to craft tools: fiber + fiber = rope rope + fiber = net rope + stone = bolas stone + wheat = seeds (will spawn a bird you can catch) carrot (use it to lure a rabbit) 

When in the ark watch out for obstacles, as they will cause your animals to fall out. The same goes for sharks that you can fight off by throwing spears. You also have a hunger bar you can fill by catching fish at a site (appears as bubbles)

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Everything else: Me
